answer:
Easy Dinner Recipes

Here are three easy dinner recipes you can make quickly, with links and cook times:

2-Ingredient Creamy Beans (15-20 min)

Simmer canned white beans with pesto for a creamy, savory meal. Easy and quick to make.

Recipe: Simply Recipes

Mustard-Baked Chicken (35 min)

Bake chicken thighs with a honey-mustard glaze for a flavorful, tender dinner. Minimal ingredients needed.

Recipe: Simply Recipes

Crock Pot Chicken Taco Meat (6-8 hours)

Slow-cook chicken in a crock pot with spices and salsa for tender, flavorful taco meat. Perfect for weeknights. Recipe: Allrecipes
